author: mkkoll
content: They never really applied the idea to DAOs, but i think many of the concepts do fit.

author: ph3n3
content: Hi, I received this private message 2mins ago, it seems a bit fishy but I don't get where's the catch ? Is this a legit wallet/exchange website ?

author: protolambda
content: That's a scam. Never trust messages like that, there are lots of bots that try to lure people into stuff. Just because they joined some common discord servers as you doesn't mean anything, web-crawlers can find discord links and bots can join. Discord doesn't have good protection against it, and adding bots to the server to counter it doesn't work well either. So just ignore it.

author: ph3n3
content: alright thanks for the advice ðŸ˜‰

content: the catch is that they ask you to make a deposit before you can withdraw
